component:nypr-design-system/components/.title: nypr-a-button
component:nypr-design-system/components/.text: Base button. Use this component to compose more specific buttons and components. If a @url is passed, an a tag is rendered. Usage: <NyprAButton> Click Me </NyprAButton>

attributes.name: nypr-a-button
attributes.description:
Base button. Use this component to compose more specific buttons and components.

If a @url is passed, an a tag is rendered.

Usage:

<NyprAButton>
  Click Me
</NyprAButton>

accessors.name: tierClass
accessors.description: Computes the class applied based on the value of tier

arguments.name: format
arguments.description: Display formatting for publishDate, according to moment.js rules: https://momentjs.com/docs/#/displaying/format/ Defaults to 'MMM D, YYYY h:mmA'

arguments.name: blank
arguments.description: Make this a plain, unstyled button. Useful for wrapping icons

arguments.name: tier
arguments.description: Which tier in the visual heirarchy this button should be.

arguments.name: type
arguments.description: Specify the type attribute for the button. Default is "button".

component:nypr-design-system/components/.title: nypr-a-kicker
component:nypr-design-system/components/.text: Render a "kicker" or small piece of decorated text. Usage: <NyprAKicker> News </NyprAKicker>

attributes.name: nypr-a-kicker
attributes.description:
Render a "kicker" or small piece of decorated text.

Usage:

<NyprAKicker>
  News
</NyprAKicker>

component:nypr-design-system/components/.title: nypr-a-media-object
component:nypr-design-system/components/.text: The OOCSS Media Object popularized by Nicole Sullivan Usage: <NyprAMediaObject as |mo|> <mo.media> Media area content, like an image </mo.media> <mo.object> Text content or other component </mo.object> </NyprAMediaObject>

attributes.name: nypr-a-media-object
attributes.description:
The OOCSS Media Object popularized by Nicole Sullivan

Usage:

<NyprAMediaObject as |mo|>
  <mo.media>
    Media area content, like an image
  </mo.media>

  <mo.object>
    Text content or other component
  </mo.object>
</NyprAMediaObject>

arguments.name: valign
arguments.description: Specify a vertical alignment. Accepts 't', 'c', 'b' for top, center, and bottom.

component:nypr-design-system/components/.title: nypr-a-picture
component:nypr-design-system/components/.text: Picture element. Renders <source> elements for provided s, m, l, or xl breakpoints and images. Usage: <NyprAPicture @break-xl=1000 @src-xl='https://example.com/xlarge-img.jpg' @break-l=800 @src-l='https://example.com/large-img.jpg' @alt='Descriptive alt text'/>

attributes.name: nypr-a-picture
attributes.description:
Picture element. Renders <source> elements for provided s, m, l, or xl breakpoints and images.

Usage:

<NyprAPicture @break-xl=1000 @src-xl='https://example.com/xlarge-img.jpg' @break-l=800 @src-l='https://example.com/large-img.jpg' @alt='Descriptive alt text'/>

arguments.name: src-xl
arguments.description: Image url for corresponding extra large breakpoint

arguments.name: src-l
arguments.description: Image url for corresponding large breakpoint

arguments.name: src-m
arguments.description: Image url for corresponding medium breakpoint

arguments.name: src-s
arguments.description: Image url for corresponding small breakpoint

arguments.name: lazy
arguments.description: Should this image lazy load or not?

component:nypr-design-system/components/.title: nypr-a-section-heading
component:nypr-design-system/components/.text: Section header markup Usage: <NyprASectionHeading> Section Header Goes Here </NyprASectionHeading>

attributes.name: nypr-a-section-heading
attributes.description:
Section header markup

Usage:

<NyprASectionHeading>
  Section Header Goes Here
</NyprASectionHeading>

component:nypr-design-system/components/.title: nypr-a-story-headline
component:nypr-design-system/components/.text: Headline markup for stories. Usage: <NyprAStoryHeadline> Headline goes here </NyprAStoryHeadline>

attributes.name: nypr-a-story-headline
attributes.description:
Headline markup for stories.

Usage:

<NyprAStoryHeadline>
  Headline goes here
</NyprAStoryHeadline>

component:nypr-design-system/components/.title: nypr-a-svg
component:nypr-design-system/components/.text: A component that will safely render any svg icon found in the app/templates/components/nypr-a-svg tree. If an svg template can't be found, a warning will be printed. Usage: <NyprASvg @icon='wnyc-logo'/>

attributes.name: nypr-a-svg
attributes.description:
A component that will safely render any svg icon found in the app/templates/components/nypr-a-svg tree.

If an svg template can't be found, a warning will be printed.

Usage:

<NyprASvg @icon='wnyc-logo'/>

arguments.name: class
arguments.description: Classname to be applied to rendered SVG markup.

arguments.name: icon
arguments.description: Filename of the icon to render.

component:nypr-design-system/components/.title: nypr-a-tag
component:nypr-design-system/components/.text: Show a tag Usage:  <NyprATag @tag='foo'/>

attributes.name: nypr-a-tag
attributes.description:
Show a tag

Usage:

  <NyprATag @tag='foo'/>

arguments.name: prefix
arguments.description: Prefix the rendered tag with a value. Defaults to "#". Set to '' to blank out.

arguments.name: url
arguments.description: Set the URL for this tag. If it's unset, the root element is a span. If it is set, this is an anchor tag.

component:nypr-design-system/components/.title: nypr-m-block
component:nypr-design-system/components/.text: Display story details Usage: <NyprMBlock @url='https://example.com/story' @src='https://picsum.photos/400/500' @alt='alt text' @category='news' @title='Story Title' @tease='Short summary of the story' @author='Jen Chung' @commentCount=100 />

attributes.name: nypr-m-block
attributes.description:
Display story details

Usage:

<NyprMBlock @url='https://example.com/story' @src='https://picsum.photos/400/500' @alt='alt text' @category='news' @title='Story Title' @tease='Short summary of the story' @author='Jen Chung' @commentCount=100 />

arguments.name: alt
arguments.description: Alt text for image. Defaults to @title if null.

arguments.name: orientation
arguments.description: Layout orientation. One of 'v' or 'h' for vertical or horizontal.

arguments.name: url
arguments.description: Story url. Will lead to comments section of given story url

component:nypr-design-system/components/.title: nypr-m-block-meta
component:nypr-design-system/components/.text: Display author name and comment count Usage: <NyprMBlockMeta @author={{@author}} @commentCount={{@commentCount}} @url={{@url}} />

attributes.name: nypr-m-block-meta
attributes.description:
Display author name and comment count

Usage:

<NyprMBlockMeta @author={{@author}} @commentCount={{@commentCount}} @url={{@url}} />

arguments.name: url
arguments.description: Story url. Will lead to comments section of given story url

component:nypr-design-system/components/.title: nypr-m-breadcrumb
component:nypr-design-system/components/.text: Display a given list of breadcrumbs. Usage: <NyprMBreadcrumb @breadcrumbs={{breadcrumbs}} />

attributes.name: nypr-m-breadcrumb
attributes.description:
Display a given list of breadcrumbs.

Usage:

<NyprMBreadcrumb @breadcrumbs={{breadcrumbs}} />

arguments.name: breadcrumbs
arguments.description: List of breadcrumb objects, with a label and url key. If there is no url value, a span will be rendered.

component:nypr-design-system/components/.title: nypr-m-byline
component:nypr-design-system/components/.text: Byline for articles to display authors, orgs, and sponsors Usage: <NyprMByline @authors={{authors}} @sponsor={{sponsor}}/>

attributes.name: nypr-m-byline
attributes.description:
Byline for articles to display authors, orgs, and sponsors

Usage:

<NyprMByline @authors={{authors}} @sponsor={{sponsor}}/>

arguments.name: authors
arguments.description: Array of Author objects with a name, url, and optional org keys

component:nypr-design-system/components/.title: nypr-m-figcaption
component:nypr-design-system/components/.text: <figcaption/> molecule for a <figure/> element. Usage: <NyprMFigcaption @caption="hello world" @credit="Getty Images" />

attributes.name: nypr-m-figcaption
attributes.description:
<figcaption/> molecule for a <figure/> element.

Usage:

<NyprMFigcaption @caption="hello world" @credit="Getty Images" />

component:nypr-design-system/components/.title: nypr-m-figure
component:nypr-design-system/components/.text: A <figure/> element with an optional caption. See nypr-a-picture and nypr-m-figcaption for additional arguments. Usage: <NyprMFigure @caption='hello' @credit='getty' @src-s='https://picsum.photos/800/600' />

attributes.name: nypr-m-figure
attributes.description:
A <figure/> element with an optional caption.

See nypr-a-picture and nypr-m-figcaption for additional arguments.

Usage:

<NyprMFigure @caption='hello' @credit='getty' @src-s='https://picsum.photos/800/600' />

arguments.name: align-caption
arguments.description: Specify a horizontal alignment. Accepts 'l', 'c', 'r' for left, center, and right

component:nypr-design-system/components/.title: nypr-m-share-tools/share
component:nypr-design-system/components/.text: Share Tools Share Button

attributes.name: nypr-m-share-tools/share
attributes.description: Share Tools Share Button

methods.name: getPopupPosition
methods.description: Measure window center to position pop up

methods.name: getURL
methods.description: Build a URL to the given services share dialog

params.name: params
params.description: Parameters to pass to share dialog

arguments.name: service
arguments.description: Social network service name to link to.

arguments.name: href
arguments.description: URL of social profile. Can be passed in as an argument, or else will be dervied based on the given username and service

arguments.name: params
arguments.description: Hash of key value pairs to pass to service via query string

component:nypr-design-system/components/.title: nypr-m-tags
component:nypr-design-system/components/.text: Display a list of tags. Usage: <NyprMTags @tags={{tags}} as |Tag tag|> <Tag @url='/tags/{{tag}}' /> </NyprMTags>

attributes.name: nypr-m-tags
attributes.description:
Display a list of tags.

Usage:

<NyprMTags @tags={{tags}} as |Tag tag|>
  <Tag @url='/tags/{{tag}}' />
</NyprMTags>

arguments.name: tags
arguments.description: List of tag values to render.

arguments.name: prefix
arguments.description: Prefix the rendered tag with a value. Defaults to "#". Set to '' to blank out.

component:nypr-design-system/components/.title: nypr-o-article-body
component:nypr-design-system/components/.text:
Article body element Usage:

some raw HTML

attributes.name: nypr-o-article-body
attributes.description:
Article body element

Usage:

<NyprOArticleBody>
 <p>some <strong>raw</strong> HTML</p>
</NyprOArticleBody>

arguments.name: body
arguments.description: Body content. Warning will be rendered raw, unescaped into the DOM

component:nypr-design-system/components/.title: nypr-o-article-footer
component:nypr-design-system/components/.text: Article Footer layout Usage: <NyprOArticleFooter as |footer|> <footer.tags @tags={{array 'foo' 'bar'}} as |Tag tag|> <Tag @url='http://example.com/tags/{{tag}}'/> </footer.tags> <footer.contact> Contact us because you've got something to say </footer.contact> <footer.donate @linkText='Click' @linkUrl='https://example.com/pledge' @message='Donate because you like us'/> <footer.comments> comments go here </footer.comments> </NyprOArticleFooter>

attributes.name: nypr-o-article-footer
attributes.description:
Article Footer layout

Usage:

<NyprOArticleFooter as |footer|>
  <footer.tags @tags={{array 'foo' 'bar'}} as |Tag tag|>
    <Tag @url='http://example.com/tags/{{tag}}'/>
  </footer.tags>

  <footer.contact>
    Contact us because you've got something to say
  </footer.contact>

  <footer.donate @linkText='Click' @linkUrl='https://example.com/pledge' @message='Donate because you like us'/>

  <footer.comments>
    comments go here
  </footer.comments>
</NyprOArticleFooter>

component:nypr-design-system/components/.title: nypr-o-article-header
component:nypr-design-system/components/.text: Header layout for articles. See nypr-o-article-header for usage.

attributes.name: nypr-o-article-header
attributes.description: Header layout for articles. See nypr-o-article-header for usage.

component:nypr-design-system/components/.title: nypr-o-contact
component:nypr-design-system/components/.text:
A contact tout Usage:

hello world

attributes.description:
A contact tout

Usage:

<NyprOContact>
  <p><strong>hello</strong> <em>world</em></p>
</NyprOContact>

component:nypr-design-system/components/.title: nypr-o-donate
component:nypr-design-system/components/.text: Donate tout Inline Usage: <NyprODonate @message='hello world' @linkText='click me' @linkUrl='http://example.com/pledge' @close=(action close) /> Block Usage: ```hbs

attributes.name: nypr-o-donate
attributes.description:
Donate tout

Inline Usage:

<NyprODonate @message='hello world' @linkText='click me' @linkUrl='http://example.com/pledge' @close=(action close) />

Block Usage: ```hbs

component:nypr-design-system/components/.title: nypr-o-related-content
component:nypr-design-system/components/.text: List of related content Usage: <NyprORelatedContent @items={{items}}/>

attributes.name: nypr-o-related-content
attributes.description:
List of related content

Usage:

<NyprORelatedContent @items={{items}}/>

arguments.name: items
arguments.description: List of items Objects with title and url keys.

template:application-tailwind.title: Your Tailwind styles
template:application-tailwind.text: Your Tailwind styles A reference for every generated class in your app.

template:docs/atoms/nypr-a-button.text: nypr-a-button Examples The NyprAButton component supports rendering as either an a tag or a button tag. If a @url argument is passed, an anchor will be rendered. Accepts an @onclick argument for button variations. Also accepts a @blank argument to remove styling. Simple Button Set a URL for the button Has been clicked? {{blank}}? Click Me

template:docs/atoms/nypr-a-media-object.text: media-object The famous media object. Examples The humble media object.

template:docs/atoms/nypr-a-picture.text: nypr-a-picture Render a <picture/> element with srcset values set for provided breakpoints. All arguments are provided below.

template:docs/atoms/nypr-a-svg.text: Available Icons default nypr-a-svg Render the above icons using the <NyprASvg/> component. Usage

template:docs/atoms/nypr-a-tag.text: nypr-a-tag Examples Basic Usage With a URL: Strip the prefix:

template:docs/atoms/nypr-a-toggle-box.text: nypr-a-toggle-box Examples Toggle Box Label Dropdown Contents

template:docs/global/typography.title: This is an H1 element
template:docs/global/typography.text: Typography Headings This is an H1 element This is an H2 element This is an H3 element This is an H4 element This is an H5 element This is an H6 element Lists Unordered List This is a list item in an unordered list An unordered list is a list in which the sequence of items is not important. Sometimes, an unordered list is a bulleted list. And this is a long list item in an unordered list that can wrap onto a new line. Lists can be nested inside of each other This is a nested list item This is another nested list item in an unordered list This is the last list item Ordered list This is a list item in an unordered list An unordered list is a list in which the sequence of items is not important. Sometimes, an unordered list is a bulleted list. And this is a long list item in an unordered list that can wrap onto a new line. Lists can be nested inside of each other This is a nested list item This is another nested list item in an unordered list This is the last list item Definition List Definition List A number of connected items or names written or printed consecutively, typically one below the other. This is a term. This is the definition of that term, which both live in a dl. Here is another term. And it gets a definition too, which is this line. Here is term that shares a definition with the term below. And it gets a definition too, which is this line. Text Elements <blockquote /> Basic blockquote element. The <p/> tag is required for decoration. Lorem ipsum <time /> Basic time element. Components nypr-a-story-headline Make text suitable for a story headline. Pass a block or a text argument. Headline with Lots of Text Can Sit Here on Multiple Lines nypr-a-section-heading Make text suitable for a section heading. Pass a block or a text argument. This is a Section Heading nypr-a-kicker Kicker used for decorating metadata. Pass a block or a test argument. Category

template:docs/molecules/nypr-m-figure.text: nypr-m-figure Render a <figure/> element with with <figcaption/> and <picture/> elements. Examples Figure with an Image Block Usage Figure with an Embed

template:docs/molecules/nypr-m-share-too.text: nypr-m-share-tools Render links and share dialogs to various social networks. Supported services are defined in addon/components/nypr-m-share-tools.js. Examples Links Share Dialog

template:docs/organisms/nypr-o-article-f.text: nypr-o-article-footer Example Usage Do you know the scoop? Comment below or Send us a Tip Hey, do you know that it takes money to write these stories? Help us tell more with your help today. comments go here
